Package ch.konnexions.orabench.utils

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.konnexions.orabench.utils.Config
  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    The configuration parameters for the Oracle JDBC benchmark tests. The configuration parameters are made available to the configuration object in a text file. This text file must contain the values of the following configuration parameters:

    • benchmark.batch.size
    • benchmark.comment
    • benchmark.database
    • benchmark.driver
    • benchmark.environment
    • benchmark.module
    • benchmark.program.name.oranif.c
    • benchmark.transaction.size
    • benchmark.trials
    • connection.host
    • connection.password
    • connection.port
    • connection.service
    • connection.string
    • connection.user
    • file.bulk.delimiter
    • file.bulk.header
    • file.bulk.length
    • file.bulk.name
    • file.bulk.size
    • file.configuration.name
    • file.configuration.name.oranif.c
    • file.configuration.name.oranif.erlang
    • file.result.delimiter
    • file.result.header
    • file.result.name
    • file.summary.delimiter
    • file.summary.header
    • file.summary.name
    • sql.create
    • sql.drop
    • sql.insert.jamdb
    • sql.insert.oracle
    • sql.select

    The parameter name and parameter value must be separated by an equal sign (=).

      Constructs a Config object.
